div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

div.p: Bedminster Township Public School is a Pre-K-8 school located in Somerset County, New Jersey, with an enrollment of around 520, a staff of over 60 teachers and a full time Child Study Team. After graduation, our students attend Bernards High School.
